item.description:
The Falon Gong is sponsoring a rally to bring attention to the atrocities committed by the Communist party of China and supporting those in China who have left the Communist Party.

This is our fight as much as it is members of the Falon Gong. The Chinese Communists have not only persecuted these peaceful people in China but also here inthe U.S. In Boston. the Communist Chinese influence is becoming so dominant that they wanted to take a monument to honor those massacred at Tienanmen Sq. down. They also raise the flag of communist China on City hall Plaza and the Boston City Council passes a resolution honoring the communist revolution in China. Yesterday, March 22, we learned that cadets at Mass Maritime Academy must salute the flag of Communist China or face disciplinary measures.

Let's show these good people that there is a large and growing freedom movement that will not tolerate the activities of Communist China.
item.name: Falon Gong sponsored rally against the Communist Party of China
